treksJson.name: Holy 7 Lakes Trek
treksJson.attractions: Lush green gorges, Valleys, dense forests
treksJson.description: 7 Lakes Trek is designed for adventure and a massive adrenaline rush. Just West of Dharamshala is a high-altitude valley nestled among the soaring peaks of the Western Dhauladhar range. This area is steeped in mythological stories, has seven snow-fed lakes and is one of the holiest places for the local Gaddi tribesmen. The trek itself is hard, the terrain challenging and weather unpredictable. An ideal trek for serious explorers, photographers, and nature lovers
